thread.title: This rideable hoverbike looks like fun but you will want to keep your arms and legs firmly tucked in
thread.title_full: This rideable hoverbike looks like fun but you will want to keep your arms and legs firmly tucked in

author: Claudia Romeo
title: This rideable hoverbike looks like fun but you will want to keep your arms and legs firmly tucked in
text:
embed 
Russian startup, Hoversurf, designed what is thought to be the world's first fully-manned hoverbike.Video of the prototype shows the product, which combines a motorbike design with quadcopter technology, flying through the air in a warehouse. The bike is electric-powered and uses four propellers. It can reach speeds of 30 mph and it can support a single rider weighing up to 19 stones.
